DIA_Q308_Hobo_SQ305_NeedPotion_03_01: Forgive me for interrupting, but I heard through the open window that you were looking for a certain potion.
DIA_Q308_Hobo_SQ305_NeedPotion_Yes_15_01: Yes, I need a potion for digestion.
DIA_Q308_Hobo_SQ305_NeedPotion_Yes_03_03: Some time ago my friends and I bought it from this here alchemist.
DIA_Q308_Hobo_SQ305_NeedPotion_Yes_03_04: Turns out we don't need it so we're happy to give it back to you for a few gold coins.
DIA_Q308_Hobo_SQ305_NeedPotion_No_15_01: I don't have time right now...
DIA_Q308_Hobo_SQ305_NeedPotion_Give_03_0: You won't regret it, it's a great potion! Truly, it can work wonders!
